Es un juego bastante divertido. 

Puede que haya algunos asesinos que al principio parecen "Pay 2 Win", pero al final resulta que todo queda en la habilidad que el jugador.

Al principio probablemente se tengan problemas a la hora de jugar, debido a la poca experiencia. Pero lentamente se va aprendiendo. 

Recomiendo mucho más el juego si tienes a más gente con quien jugarlo (al menos otras tres personas), ya que la comunicación del equipo de supervivientes llega a ser importante. Jugar como asesino también llega a ser bastante entretenido cuando sabes qué asesino es el que se te da mejor.

분명히 재밌는 게임이지만, 밸런싱이 난해간 게임인걸 감안하셔야 합니다.
살인마와 생존자간의 밸런스의 극차가 꽤 심한편입니다. 
초기엔 살인마가 압도적으로 유리하지만, 조금 익숙해 지기 시작하면 생존자가 점차 유리해져 가는 구조입니다.
뭐 여기까진 게임 특징이니 그려려니 하더라도, 티배깅등 상대 플레이어를 농락하는 플레이가 너무 만연하다는게 가장 큰 단점입니다.
초보시라면 아는 사람과 생존자부터 시작하는걸 추천해드립니다.

[h1][b] Dead by Daylight - Единственная игра в своём роде. [/b][/h1]

Игра появилась довольно давно, и с каждым днем её комьюнити только растёт.
Это не удивительно, так как разработчики очень часто общаются с игроками и держут в курсе с помощью стримов Twitch.
[b] Большой им за это респект [/b]

[b][u]Плюсы[/u][/b]
[list]
[*] Отличная задумка
[*] Огромное количество умений, что даёт большой разгон для фантазии.
[*] Отсутствие гибкой настройки графики/эффектов и т.п. Это хорошо потому-что в целом все будут находится на равных условия. К примеру у маньяка точно такая же прорисовка травы, густота тумана и т.п.
[*] Система рангов и Эмблем. 
[*] Разнообразие выживших, что не даёт вам строгой привязки к персонажу. Даже с тем учётом что у каждого персонажа есть свои "Уникальные" перки, их можно будет выучить на 30/35/40 уровне и без проблем обучить на других персонажах.
[*] С маньяками почти такая же ситуация с перками, но в отличие от Выживших, у каждого из них есть свои способности и каждый маньяк "Уникален" в отличие от выживших.
[/list]

[b][u]Минусы[/u][/b]
[list]
[*] Оптимизация - очень странное чувство когда играешь в GTA V на высоких 50-60 fps, а игра у которой матчи происходят на замкнутом пространстве выдаёт 45-60 fps на низких настройках.
[*] Баги - залатали один, появилось два. И так постоянное, обновление за обновлением.
[*] Баланс - именно баланс маньяков, некоторые маньяки бесполезны, по сравнению с новыми. 
[*] Компьнити чуть лучше, чем в дотке. Хорошо что тут микрофонов нету! Поиграете, поймёте.
[/list]
В целом игра хорошая, и которое вы будите проводить в ней, зависит только от вашего интереса к MOBA играм. 
Мини-совет: Выключайте совесть в этой игре. Данный совет не раз позволит сбежать.

The first glimpse:

The first time I saw this game was on the release date and since I never really played a survivor game I was a bit prejudiced. Iam also not a big fan of horror games overall.

So in December 2017 I got bored of all the games that I was then playing and I wanted something else for a change, I decided to give this game a try and uhh.. Yeah I like it, in matter of fact I like it so much I felt the need to write a small review about it.

Overall feeling,
It has a nice "Horror touch" and the atmosphere is actually really solid when you are new to the game, the graphics is overall well done. The only downside is that the game is somewhat capped at 60 FPS.

Gameplay:
The game is very straight forward, there are 4 survivors against 1 killer. You can play both alone and with friends as survivor while the killer obviously plays alone. 

The main goal for survivors is to escape while the killer's goal is to (Obviously?) kill everyone.

There are alot of different elements to the game what you can do depending on how you want to approach every game depending on addons/perks. Let me tell you right now that no game is the same as the one before.

1. There are alot of different killers with different weapons/abilities.
2. There are alot of different survivors you can choose from.
3. There are alot of different maps to play. (Some maps kinda look the same for a new player)

Summary:
I never thought that I would be playing this game for more than 20-30 hours because of me not being much into either horror or survival games but damn I was actually really wrong about this game. I've become pretty much addicted to it and I gotta say its not often that happens for me these days.

So I will end this with a classic quote: Dont judge the book by its cover!

Once this game gets some real competition, it's screwed. The developers don't listen to the community, balancing is awful, and they're changing things that don't need to be changed, just for the sake of changing it.

When playing the killer is more stressful than playing a survivor, you know there is something fundamentally wrong. If all you want is an adrenaline rush the game might be worth the money. Otherwise stay away, even if the game is on sale you should strongly consider if you want to participate in this salty excuse of a horror game. I myself am done with this one, I'd say it was fun while it lasted but that would be a lie.



[h1] Killer [/h1]
If you're looking for a power fantasy, playing an unstoppable serial killer terrorizing the 4 survivors. 
[b] Stay away, this game will not provide that experience in it's current state. [/b]

If you're instead looking to experience the joys of overly altruistic survivors running circles around you as you carry one of their downed friends. If you're looking to experience the joys of chasing survivors in an infinite loop as they take their sweet time teabagging, self-healing, spamming their flashlights, emoting, etc. after every single pallet and/or window. If you're looking experience the satisfaction of finally catching someone only to then have them decisive strike out of your grip, be saved with borrowed time immediately after, or just be bodyblocked into oblivion. If you're looking for a game where you yourself have no direct control over whether you win or lose, and insted have to rely on others to make a mistake first. 
[b] Then this is the game for you, and I salute you, for you can find enjoyment in something I can only find pure unbridled frustration in. [/b]

[h1] Survivor [/h1]
The game is advertised as a horror game, and it's certainly provide yo uthat experience at least in the beginning when you're still learning the ropes. And maybe, just maybe, later as well if you're able to fully immerse yourself in the game. Otherwise the "horror" will quickly wear off as you realize that the survivors are the ones that hold all the power over how a match will go. And even if you manage to immerse yourself, whatever immersion you managed to achieve will quickly shatter as you watch the other survivors borderline bully the killer into submission.

The game game is pretty fun and enjoyable, pretty good to buy when on sale.

If you get the game just remember that the game is played how you want it to be. You want to camp, run flashlights, pallet loop, mori all the surviors. It's all your choice. 

Unfortunately, all you will hear afterwards is people whining on both sides no matter who won or lost.

So, just play the game how you want and ignore the rest afterwards.

Maybe just like calm down after a game by giving yourself a quick break. Too much hate in the post-game lobby for anyone to worry about how other people feel.

Play with friends for sure, just for added enjoyment.

Allerdings gibt es auch genug Survivor die einen den ganzen Tag mit ihren Flashlights auf den Sacks gehen... Also in Wahrheit sind beide Seiten voll mit Heulsusen . Davon aber abgesehen macht das Spiel viel spaß mit Freunden und wenn man als Killer ordentlich spielt und nicht rumcampt kriegt man nette Kommentare und als Streamer sogar neue Viewer :) Allgemein bin ich als Main Killer recht zufrieden mit dem Spiel und freue mich eigentlich immer auf ein neues DLC. Allerdings hätte man das Spiel viel angenehmer gestallten können wenn man die Spezial Perks auf den Jeweiligen Killer gelassen oder Survivor gelassen hätte.

Trés bon jeu sur lequel on pourrait passer beaucoup d'heures a s'amuser avec des amis. 

Malheuresement il y a une bien trop mauvaise mentalité sur le jeu, ce qui rend le jeu parfois insuportable. Entre les trolls et les campeurs, les tueurs qui déco quand ils voient une team dans le lobby, les surivants qui infinite (Ne venez pas me dire qu'il y a un counter),  on est servit. Vous me direz que c'est de bonne guerre mais ça pourris l'expérience de jeu et l'amusement qu'il peut y avoir sur ce jeu.

Malgrés tout ça, on y revient en espérant à chaque fois un tueur qui sache réellement jouer au jeu sans abuser du concept. 

Ne fais pas aux autres ce que tu ne voudrais pas qu'on te fasse.

If you play survivor you'll have a difficult game, where skilled gameplay and second lasting decisions can be the difference between actually surviving, or getting yourself and possibly even a teammate killed. You can probably get through an entire game without even seeing the killer, escape, and then find out your other 3 teammates had a hell of a time juking the killer around pallets. Or you can be the survivor that jukes the killer around pallets, through windows, and accross the map, only to find the hatch or escape before he can down you.

If you play killer, you'll have a difficult game, where if you win, the survivors will call you names and make fun of you for one of the following reasons:
[list]
    [*]Camping (You stayed more than 5 seconds near a hooked survivor, sometimes less)
    [*]Tunneling (You tried to attack someone you've already hooked)
    [*]Running cheap perks (You used a perk that makes you stronger)
    [*]Facecamping (You actually stayed close to the hooked survivor for a prolonged period of time)
    [*]So bad (When the survivor can't figure out what excuse they can use to make you feel bad)
    [*]Hacker (They'll find a way to say you're hacking, regardless if you are or not)
    [*]Lag-Switch (You or they lagged at any point in the game, and it's your fault)
    [*]Rude (You didn't spare the last survivor)
    [*]Reported (You did any of the above to a Survive With Friends team that never read the rules)
    [*]Tryhard (You tried to win)
    [*]No-Life (If they check your profile and you have more than 100 hours)
    [*]Cheater (You used in-game mechanics to try to win. Ex: Body blocking to prevent Borrowed Time)
[/list]
If you don't win, and therefor, you don't kill ANY survivors, they'll usually end the game by saying "gg" or calling you bad. Also, they'll usually teabag you at the exit gates regardless of what happens during the game. Oh, and the gameplay is fun.
on my mind its a good game

Overally, the game is very good. Graphics are nice and gameplay is interesting. Variety of survivors, killers, perks, offerings, items and add-ons gives you other tactics and changes the whole gameplay. Thanks to that Dead by Daylight is still fun even after playing for 100+ hours. The one thing that might be irritating is people - some killers just camp near a hooked survivor making it impossible to save him. I know that's a part of the game, but it can sometimes stop you from making a daily ritual, especially when your playing as a character you don't main.

[u] Топ игра [/u]

having over 100 hours on this game, i finally have something to say about it, i will go over the main and obvious problems first, but for now, lets look at this games pros and cons

Pros:
Original game and system (this game has original designs and game mechanics to make it stand out)
Fun leveling system (its nice to explore the bloodwebs and explore what type of paths you go, till you make prestige)
Never gets boring (theres always something fun about this game, the killers you face, the type of survivors youre with, etc.)
Some of the bugs have been squashed (im not saying all bugs have been patched, as i still se quite alot, but most of the bigger ones have been patched as of 1.9.1, and hoping they make this game sort of bug free)

okay, pros over, now to get to the part everyone loves, the cons

Cons:
Op perks (alot of survivor perks are way too overpowered, borrowed time, prove thyself, dead hard, sprint burst, etc.)
No balance (theres always gonna be that 1 killer who overpowers another, for example, the hillbilly will outclass someone like the wraith any day of the week, another example of no balance is the way the survivors play, theres almost no certainty that youre gonna win a match, it all comes down to pure skill, which is fine for a while, but once you get to the 1000 hour mark, you will notice a huge difference in how survivors play)

im only putting this out there, the amount of time you need to put into this game to be good is IMMENSE, and im not lying, im still pretty new since i have 100 hours, but i have plenty to say, and the balance issues a huge factor into rather or not you should buy it, now to the next step.

do i reccomend this game to you: Well, the simple answer is... no, and yes, it all depends on how you want to play the game, if youre not competitve, dont buy it, if youre competitive and want to try it out, go ahead, but since the vast majority doesnt like to try and go competitve, as of right now, and the games current state, i wouldnt reccoment this game at the moment, now not to say that i wont keep playing it, ill certainly keep playing this game myself because i myself are competitive, and love it, but for the rest, friday the 13th would be the game for you,

Я не особо много поиграл, но могу уже с легкостью сказать что игра не надоест.
Постоянно есть ощущения турнира, мол мы 4 выживших против 1 маньяка, заводим генераторы, убегаем от него, мансим в моментах с досками, открываем ворота и оставляю маньяка  с носом.
За маньяка: вид от 1 лица очень ухудшает маньяка ибо выжившие могут легко скрыться из поля зрения, но также маньяк находит не только глазами, но и по следам, остаткам крови, воронам, лишними громкими звуками от выживших (перепрыгнули через доску когда бежите или громко зашли спрятаться в шкафчик, открываете сундук, спасаете выжившего с крюка и т.д.), также у маньяка тоже как и у выживших, есть куча перков (которые можно прокачать в кровавой паутине) которые помогают поскорее убить всех выживших.
Также систему рангов подравняли и теперь будучи 20 ранг - вы не сможете встретить профессионала с 1 ранга!

*спустя 8 месяцев знакомства с игрой*

Азарт к игре остался дикий, даже увеличился когда узнал много полезного для себя. Как и за мана так и за сурва. Очень рад что разработчики добавляют много нового в игру, также добавили возможность покупки платных дополнений за вашу игру, т.е. чем больше играете - получаете больше осколков - покупаете манов и сурвов из дополнений за осколки. Благодарю разрабов за сия шедевр, всем рекомендую!)
Fun game gotta get used to it though
One love
